scripts.start:dev: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development nest start --watch
scripts.import:agents: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node scripts/import-agents.ts import ./data/agents.json
scripts.import:jobs: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node scripts/import-jobs.ts import ./data/jobs.json
scripts.match:jobs-agents: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node scripts/match-jobs-agents.ts
scripts.match:jobs-agents:prod: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js production) NODE_ENV=production npx ts-node scripts/match-jobs-agents.ts
scripts.test:matching: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node scripts/test-matching.ts
scripts.demo:matching: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node scripts/demo-matching.ts
scripts.prisma:dev: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js development) npx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:prod: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js production) npx prisma studio
scripts.import:agents:prod: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js production) NODE_ENV=production npx ts-node scripts/import-agents.ts import ./data/agents.json
scripts.import:jobs:prod: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js production) NODE_ENV=production npx ts-node scripts/import-jobs.ts import ./data/jobs.json
scripts.db:prod:status: DATABASE_URL=$(node scripts/get-db-url.js production) npx prisma db pull --print
